message: A new Tweeten update system is here. And it's AMAZING if you are on Windows.
new: Tweeten's installer on Windows is now down to ~40MB, down from ~160MB ðŸŽ‰
Tweeten now supports delta updates for major updates and patches, which means you can now update to the latest version of Tweeten in seconds. Like Flash âš¡

Tweeten now checks for updates in the background, so when you are running the app for hours and there's a new update released, you can get it installed instantly without having to restart the app to check for updates âœ¨
The update system is now more reliable and less prone to crashing ðŸ™Œ
Tweeten should now once again be functional on older versions of macOS (e.g. 10.9.5) ðŸ˜Œ
